content: at the end of the chart or in the middle of the chart as described above so slip it without working it then continue with *p2 k2* etc rib k1 *p2 k2* to last 3 sts of needle p2 k1 repeat on second needle work in rib for 2 inches / 5 cm bind off loosely using your favorite stretchy bind-off i used elizabeth ​ zimmerman s sewn bind-off for a nice edge but it took me several projects to get to where i don t ​ make this bind-off too tight for those still working on gauge i would recommend jeny s surprisingly ​ stretchy bind-off ​ weave in ends block and enjoy © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 5 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens foot chart 56 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 6 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens leg chart 56 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 7 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens foot chart 64 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 8 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens leg chart 64 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 9 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens foot chart 72 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 10 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only speckled space socks knitting pattern by amanda b stephens leg chart 72 sts © copyright 2016 amanda b stephens page | 11 of 11 pattern for personal non-commercial use only
